item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (192 points | 132 comments)
2. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (92 points | 24 comments)
3. Fun facts about Google Scholar (63 points | 32 comments)
4. Europeans spend 575M hours clicking on cookie banners a year (50 points | 21 comments)
5. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (131 points | 59 comments)
6. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (46 points | 23 comments)
7. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (115 points | 28 comments)
8. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (65 points | 11 comments)
9. Finland and Lithuania Report Severed Undersea Data Cables (61 points | 11 comments)
10. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (33 points | 5 comments)
11. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (72 points | 80 comments)
12. Towards Nyquist Learners (20 points | 6 comments)
13. Reactive HTML Notebooks (241 points | 39 comments)
14. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (40 points | 2 comments)
15. Extending the context length to 1M tokens (56 points | 82 comments)
16. Ben Affleck's a surprisingly comprehensive take on LLMs for video (30 points | 4 comments)
17. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (109 points | 18 comments)
18. Illegally logged wood from Cambodia likely ending up in U.S. homes (63 points | 30 comments)
19. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (204 points | 83 comments)
20. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (107 points | 122 comments)
21. Show HN: Documind – Open-source AI tool to turn documents into structured data (127 points | 33 comments)
22. Libobscura (57 points | 4 comments)
23. Museum of Bad Art (153 points | 113 comments)
24. Bhutan, after prioritizing happiness, now faces an existential crisis (189 points | 217 comments)
25. Reverse Engineering iOS 18 Inactivity Reboot (469 points | 144 comments)
26. Against Best Practices (160 points | 123 comments)
27. Unreal 5.5 is a big deal [video] (71 points | 32 comments)
28. The tragedy of running an old Node project (60 points | 67 comments)
29. Fortran II Hypersource (56 points | 6 comments)
30. Phonetic Matching (57 points | 15 comments)
